title: Tell Sabi Abyad
description: An archaeological site located in the Balikh River valley of northern Syria. The site consists of four prehistoric settlement horizons that archaeologists describe as Tell Sabi Abyad I to IV.

properties.description: Representative location of Tell Sabi Abyad based on coordinates derived from GeoHack and verified in Google Earth 2016.
properties.title: Imagery location of Tell Sabi Abyad
